GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, PDF, PPT, PPTX, XLS, XLSX, TXT, DOC, DOCX, RTF

Display.Other Display Features: Retina Display, Finger Print Resistant, Oleophobic Coating on Front and Back, Brightness, Multi-touch

Camera.Other Camera Features: Primary Camera: Auto Focus, Tap to Focus, Face Detection, Panorama, Geo-tagging, Backside Illumination Sensor, Five-element Lens, Hybrid IR Filter, f / 2.4 Aperture

Internet & Connectivity.Charging Point: Charging via USB to Computer System or Power Adapter

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports MOV, AVI, H.264, M4V, AAC-LC, MP4, MPEG-4, Full HD

Other Features.Additional Features: Video Stabilisation, Multiple Languages and Characters Support, Games, Calculator, Calendar, Voice Memos, FaceTime, Reminders, Passbook, Clock, Dictionary Support, AirPlay Mirroring to Apple TV Support, AirPlay Video Streaming to Apple TV (2nd and 3rd Generation)
Other Features.Important Apps: Weather, iTunes Store, App Store, News Stand, iMovie, iBooks, iTunes U, Podcasts, Find My iPhone, Find My Friends, Remote, iTunes Festival, Stocks, iPhoto, Keynote, Pages, Numbers
Other Features.Sensors: Proximity Sensor, Three-axis Gyro Sensor, Accelerometer, Digital Compass, Ambient Light Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and for in the box accessories
